```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rio)
library(here)
```

```{r}
data <- import(here("Data", "rstats_tweets.rds"))
data
```

```{r, commit 2}

pd<- data %>%
  count(screen_name) %>%
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  dplyr::slice(1:25) %>%
  mutate(screen_name = factor(screen_name), 
         screen_name = forcats::fct_reorder(screen_name, n))

ggplot(pd, aes(x = screen_name, y = n)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip()

```
